content: round rnds 17-30 *k1 p1* to end of round 108 sts round 31 switch to larger needle and *k1 p1* to end of round connect folded edge of brim to ws slip stitches from provisional co onto the smaller circular needle used for the ribbing remove waste yarn fold the co sts under and inside the top of the working edge round 32 knit 1 round working 1 st from the larger needle and 1 st from the smaller needle together in each st 108 sts body starting at the bottom right corner work row 1-42 in chart 1 repeating each row 4 times across each round place a stitch marker between each chart repeat to help keep track of your place for a shorter hat work row 13-42 in the color work chart starting at red line repeating each row 4 times across each round crown decreases work row 43-61 in the color work chart repeating each row 4 times across each round remove bor marker break mc and cc leaving 8-inch tails pull tails through remaining 12 sts and tighten finishing weave in all ends wet block to measurements page 4 sumac glass hat charts chart 1 page 5
